title: Comedy Platform Business Context and Humanitix Integration Requirements
description: Need comprehensive documentation of business context and requirements driving Humanitix integration for the comedy platform. This includes: 1) Comedy Event Management Requirements - venue data criticality for event location tracking ('iD Comedy Club', 'Darlinghurst' etc), event capacity and pricing management, comedian booking and spot assignment integration, customer management for comedy shows, 2) Financial Data Requirements - fee rebate importance for quantity calculations ( per ticket), financial tracking for comedian payments, revenue reporting for comedy events, ticket sales reconciliation needs, 3) Customer Data Flow - how Humanitix customer data integrates with platform user management, comedian-audience connection tracking, repeat customer identification, marketing and engagement workflows, 4) Event Lifecycle Management - event creation to completion tracking, ticket sales monitoring, attendance verification, post-event reporting requirements, 5) Integration with Existing Platform Features - connection to spot assignment system, invoice generation for comedians, notification systems for event updates, analytics and reporting integration. Essential for understanding business value of integration and ensuring technical implementation serves actual platform needs.
